wikipedia_page.main: Jason Lai (born 1974) is a British orchestral conductor. He was assistant conductor of the BBC Philharmonic from 2002 to 2005. At present he is the Principal Conductor of the Conservatory Orchestra at the Yong Siew Toh Conservatory of Music which is part of the National University of Singapore. He is also an integral coach, presenter and speaker.

response: * Jason Lai (Orchestral Conductor and TV Presenter)
|Sue Perkins (TV & radio presenter, actress and writer)Mentor: Jason Lai)

Since the death of their founding Musical Director in 2008 the orchestra has worked with a number of conductors including Jason Lai, Nick Collon, Dominic Wheeler, Andrew Gourlay, Adrian Brown and Peter Stark.
